H2.text: Leslie should accept all scientific theories even if they have been proven wrong is what the teacher most likely meant when she told Leslie to take a flexible approach to solving problems.

A4.text: He writes that in his work on new theories of international trade he reviewed prior work with an open frame of mind and broadened his initial viewpoint even in unlikely directions.

A5.text: Psychologist Kevin Dunbar says the process of discovery often starts with researchers finding bugs in their experiments.
